channel.title: Changing the "::" before a command?
channel.description: Can i change the :: before a command? Like say for instance make it **(command) instead of ::(command)

item.title: Changing the "::" before a command?
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

Thanks but i have nother question which no one seems to know you think you might? I’m tryin to make it so you can’t use a command in castle wars.

if (command.startsWith("") && incwars() || inzamorak() || insaradomin()) { sendMessage("You cannot do any commands in castle wars!"); }
I tried that but obviously it didn’t work because the commands still work, but that message does pop up.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing the "::" before a command?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

You’ll have to do that client-sided and create a new packet for it or plain just change packet 103 client sided to use ** etc instead of ::

Read full topic
